key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including $360,187 in penalties and a data breach class action investigation
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities highlighted in the 2024 10-K filing
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on regional markets and small to medium-sized businesses
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Data breach class action investigation involving potential exposure of customer data
Customer dissatisfaction with poor service and operational inefficiencies
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction and potential reputational damage from poor service
governance_issues: Leadership changes indicating a focus on financial stability and technological innovation
